name: patient_id
description: Unique patient identifier

name: patient_age
description: Patient age in years (must be 22 years or older for eligibility)

name: patient_bmi
description: Body Mass Index (BMI) threshold for eligibility (less than 35 kg/m^2; equal to or greater than 35 kg/m^2 is a contraindication)

name: psg_consultation_window_months
description: Time window within which a polysomnography must be performed relative to the first HGNS implant consultation (within 24 months)

name: central_mixed_apneas_percentage
description: Percentage of central and mixed apneas relative to total AHI (must be less than 25% for eligibility; more than one-quarter is a contraindication)

name: ahi_score
description: Apnea-Hypopnea Index (AHI) score in events per hour for eligibility (range 15 to 65 events/hour)

name: cpap_failure_ahi
description: Apnea-Hypopnea Index (AHI) score indicating CPAP failure (greater than 15 despite CPAP usage)

name: cpap_usage_hours_per_night
description: CPAP usage in hours per night (less than 4 hours indicates intolerance)

name: cpap_usage_nights_per_week
description: CPAP usage in nights per week (less than 5 nights indicates intolerance)

name: cpap_intolerance_flag
description: Flag indicating patient intolerance to CPAP therapy (e.g., CPAP returned, or insufficient usage as defined)

name: complete_concentric_collapse_flag
description: Absence of complete concentric collapse at the soft palate level on Drug-Induced Sleep Endoscopy (DISE) procedure (absence required for eligibility)

name: tonsil_size
description: Tonsil size per standardized tonsillar hypertrophy grading scale (size 3 or 4 is a contraindication)

name: preexisting_implantable_device_flag
description: Presence of another implantable device that could interact with HGNS system (contraindication)

name: neuromuscular_disease_flag
description: Presence of neuromuscular disease (contraindication)

name: hypoglossal_nerve_palsy_flag
description: Presence of hypoglossal-nerve palsy (contraindication)

name: severe_pulmonary_disease_flag
description: Presence of severe restrictive or obstructive pulmonary disease (contraindication)

name: pulmonary_arterial_hypertension_severity
description: Severity of pulmonary arterial hypertension (moderate-to-severe is a contraindication)

name: severe_valvular_heart_disease_flag
description: Presence of severe valvular heart disease (contraindication)

name: nyha_heart_failure_class
description: New York Heart Association (NYHA) heart failure class (III or IV is a contraindication)

name: recent_myocardial_infarction_flag
description: Presence of a recent myocardial infarction (within the past 6 months is a contraindication)

name: severe_cardiac_arrhythmias_flag
description: Presence of severe cardiac arrhythmias (within the past 6 months is a contraindication)

name: recent_cardiac_event_window_months
description: Time window for recent myocardial infarction or severe cardiac arrhythmias (within past 6 months is a contraindication)

name: uncontrolled_hypertension_flag
description: Presence of persistent uncontrolled hypertension despite medication use (contraindication)

name: serious_mental_illness_adl_interference_flag
description: Presence of active, serious mental illness that reduces ADLs and interferes with device operation/reporting (contraindication)

name: nonrespiratory_sleep_disorder_flag
description: Presence of coexisting nonrespiratory sleep disorders confounding functional sleep assessment (contraindication)

name: pregnancy_status_flag
description: Whether patient is pregnant or plans to become pregnant (contraindication)

name: mri_required_model_3024_flag
description: Whether patient requires MRI with HGNS implant model 3024 (contraindication)

name: ability_to_operate_device_remote_flag
description: Patient's inability or lack of necessary assistance to operate the sleep remote (contraindication)

name: compromised_upper_airway_neurological_control_flag
description: Presence of any condition or procedure that has compromised neurological control of the upper airway (contraindication)

name: procedure_hypoglossal_nerve_stimulation
description: Performance of Hypoglossal Nerve Stimulation (HGNS) procedure

name: diagnosis_obstructive_sleep_apnea
description: Diagnosis of Obstructive Sleep Apnea (OSA)

name: treatment_continuous_positive_airway_pressure
description: Use of Continuous Positive Airway Pressure (CPAP) as a treatment modality

name: device_fda_approval_status
description: Status of hypoglossal nerve neurostimulation device regarding FDA approval (FDA-approved required for coverage)

name: device_battery_life_years
description: Battery life of the implantable hypoglossal nerve stimulation device components (7 to 10 years)

name: device_activation_delay_minutes
description: Delay time before the hypoglossal nerve stimulation device activates after patient activation (20 minutes)

name: physician_specialty
description: Required physician specialty for HGNS insertion (board certified or board eligible otolaryngologist)

name: physician_degree
description: Required physician degree for HGNS insertion (MD or DO)

name: surgeon_device_training_flag
description: Requirement for surgeons to receive specific training on device implant techniques (classroom instruction and cadaver training)

name: sleep_professional_device_titration_training_flag
description: Requirement for sleep physicians and sleep technicians to receive training on device titration and operation

name: sleep_physician_board_certification_flag
description: Requirement for sleep physicians involved in evaluation, referral, and post-implant evaluation to be board eligible or certified

name: sleep_technician_qualifications_reference
description: Reference to LCD L34040 for sleep technician qualifications

name: sleep_facility_accreditation_flag
description: Requirement for sleep studies to be performed in an accredited sleep facility as per LCD L34040

name: dise_provider_certification_flag
description: Requirement for inserting provider for Drug Induced Sleep Endoscopy (DISE) to be certified by FDA-approved manufacturer's second opinion service of validation
